Welcome to MDSuite’s documentation!¶

Thank you for being here. At the moment, we are keeping the code private while it is in its alpha development stage. If you would like to test the code, or to look at it for your own work, please email me at stovey@icp.uni-stuttgart.de and I will arrange access. In the mean time, look through the documentation here to see what will be coming soon.
